aboutMeSection.title: About me
aboutMeSection.contentText1: My expertise lies mainly in modern technologies such as React and React Native for the front-end, where I thrive on managing dynamic and intuitive user interfaces. On the back-end, I stand out for my mastery of NodeJS, enabling the implementation of robust functionalities and efficient data management.
aboutMeSection.contentText2: My recent career path bears witness to my determination to constantly learn and evolve in the field of development, with a resolute commitment to technical excellence and innovation.

contactMeSection.title: Get in touch
contactMeSection.openToDiscuss: I'm always open to discussing new projects and opportunities.
